course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website is for an engineering college, Vidyavardhaka College of Engineering, with its primary offerings focused on various Bachelor of Engineering (BE), Master of Technology (M.Tech), and Master of Computer Applications (MCA) degrees, all heavily emphasizing computer science, software development, AI/ML, and other technical engineering disciplines.
